skills.name: Rising Spell Force
skills.blurb: {{sbc|Innate:}} {{cis|Ezreal}} gains stacks hitting abilities against enemies, up to a cap.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Ezreal's''' [[champion ability|abilities]] generate a [[stack]] of ''Rising Spell Force'' for every enemy they hit, stacking up to 5 times and lasting for 6 seconds, refreshing the duration on subsequent hits. Each stack grants him {{sti|as|{{as|10% '''bonus''' attack speed}}}}, up to {{as|50%|attack speed}} at 5 stacks.
skills.descriptionHtml: Innate: Ezreal's champion ability generate a stack of Rising Spell Force for every enemy they hit, stacking up to 5 times and lasting for 6 seconds, refreshing the duration on subsequent hits. Each stack grants him 10% bonus attack speed, up to 50% at 5 stacks.
skills.notes: * ''Rising Spell Force'' will stack even if the abilities hit were blocked by {{tip|spell shield|spell shields}}.

skills.name: Mystic Shot
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Ezreal}} fires a bolt of energy that deals {{as|physical damage}} to the first enemy hit.
If the bolt hits an enemy, all of '''Ezreal's''' ability cooldowns are {{sti|ah|reduced}}.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ezreal''' fires a bolt of energy in the target direction that deals {{as|physical damage}} to the first enemy hit and applies {{tip|on-hit}} and {{tip|on-attack}} effects at 100% effectiveness.
If ''Mystic Shot'' successfully hits an enemy, '''Ezreal's''' abilities' cooldowns are {{sti|ah|reduced}} by {{fd|1.5}} seconds (including ''Mystic Shot's'').
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Ezreal fires a bolt of energy in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy hit and applies on-hit and on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness.
If Mystic Shot successfully hits an enemy, Ezreal's abilities' cooldowns are reduced by 1.5 seconds (including Mystic Shot's).
skills.notes:
* ''Mystic Shot'' deals {{tip|basic damage}}, but also triggers spell effects by dealing an additional 0 {{tip|spell damage}}.
* ''Mystic Shot'' benefits from [[life steal]], [[omnivamp]], and [[physical vamp]], but not [[spell vamp]].
* Even if the ability is blocked by {{tip|spell shield}} it will still trigger the cooldown reduction.
* ''Mystic Shot'' is fired from wherever '''Ezreal''' is at the end of the cast time.
* ''Mystic Shot'' will be buffered and cast when the cooldown ends if the player attempts to cast it within {{fd|0.05}} seconds of the cooldown ending.

effects.str: • Physical Damage: (+ 130% AD) (+ 15% AP)

skills.name: Essence Flux
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Ezreal}} fires an orb that shortly sticks to the first enemy {{tip|champion}}, epic {{tip|monster}}, or {{tip|turret|structure}} hit.
His next attack on the target will detonate the orb, dealing them {{as|magic damage}}. If the orb was detonated with an ability, '''Ezreal''' restores {{as|{{sti|mana}}}}.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ezreal''' fires an orb in the target direction that sticks onto first enemy {{tip|champion}}, epic {{tip|monster}}, or [[structures|structure]] hit for 4 seconds.
His next [[basic attack]] or [[champion ability|ability]] against the target detonates the orb, dealing them {{as|magic damage}}.
If the orb was detonated with an ability, '''Ezreal''' restores the {{as|{{sti|mana cost}}}} of that ability plus {{sti|mana|{{as|60 mana}}}}.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Ezreal fires an orb in the target direction that sticks onto first enemy champion, epic monster, or structures hit for 4 seconds.
His next basic attack or champion ability against the target detonates the orb, dealing them magic damage.
If the orb was detonated with an ability, Ezreal restores the mana cost of that ability plus 60 mana.
skills.notes:
* The application of ''Essence Flux'' deals 0 {{tip|proc damage}} ({{pending for test}}: damage type?), triggering [[combat status|in-combat]] effects such as drawing turret aggro and [[Monster#Monster_Behavior|monster aggression]], {{ri|Sudden Impact}} or applying {{ii|Elixir of Sorcery}}.
* ''Essence Flux'' cannot be triggered by an ability that was blocked by a {{tip|spell shield}}.
** If triggered by a basic attack, {{tip|spell shield}} will prevent the damage dealt by ''Essence Flux'' only.
* ''Essence Flux'' will be triggered even if the attack is {{tip|blocked}} (the orb will still deal damage).
* ''Essence Flux'' will not be triggered via basic attack if the attack is {{tip|dodge|dodged}}, or missed because '''Ezreal''' was {{tip|blind|blinded}}.
* ''Essence Flux'' is fired from wherever '''Ezreal''' is at the end of the cast time.

effects.str: • Magic Damage: (+ 60% bonus AD) (+ % AP)

skills.name: Arcane Shift
skills.blurb: {{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Ezreal}} {{tip|blinks}} to the target location and fires a bolt that strikes the nearest enemy, dealing {{as|magic damage}}.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} After the cast time, '''Ezreal''' {{tip|blinks}} from his current location up-to 475 units towards the target location, firing a homing bolt that deals {{as|magic damage}} to the nearest enemy and briefly {{tip|sight|reveals}} them.
''Arcane Shift'' prioritizes targets hit by {{ai|Essence Flux|Ezreal}}.
''The bolt does not require the target to be {{tip|sight|visible}}.''
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: After the cast time, Ezreal blinks from his current location up-to 475 units towards the target location, firing a homing bolt that deals magic damage to the nearest enemy and briefly reveals them.
Arcane Shift prioritizes targets hit by Ezreal's Essence Flux.
The bolt does not require the target to be visible.
skills.notes: * If '''Ezreal''' is moved during the cast time, his range to blink will update accordingly. This does not exceed the maximum target range.

effects.str: • Magic Damage: (+ 50% bonus AD) (+ 75% AP)

skills.name: Trueshot Barrage
skills.blurb: {{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Ezreal}} winds up to fire a powerful bolt of energy that deals {{as|physical damage}} to enemies hit.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ezreal''' fires an energy projectile in the target direction, which briefly grants {{tip|sight}} of the area it flies through and deals {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Ezreal fires an energy projectile in the target direction, which briefly grants sight of the area it flies through and deals magic damage to enemies hit.
Minions and non-epic monsters take 50% reduced damage.
skills.notes:
* The minimap icon of ''Trueshot Barrage'' can be seen by '''Ezreal''' and all his allies.
* ''Trueshot Barrage'' will fire from wherever '''Ezreal''' was at the start of the cast time.

effects.str: • Magic Damage: (+ 100% bonus AD) (+ 90% AP)
• Reduced Damage: (+ 50% bonus AD) (+ 45% AP)
